brainly_data.question: A patient is given a 50 mg dose of medicine the medicines affective Ness decreases every hour at a constant rate of 40% what is the exponential decay function that models this scenario how much medicine will be left in the patient's system after two hours
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: A patient is given a 50 mg dose of medicine the medicines affective Ness decreases every hour at a constant rate of 40% what is the exponential decay function that models this scenario how much medicine will be left in the patient's system after two hours
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
The following formula is used to find the answer.
                                       D = 50 mg (0.6^n)
D is the dosage 
n is at any hour 
Using this formula and solving the equation for it, the answer is 18.
